verses.t: For{G1063} the law{G3588} having{G2192} a shadow{G4639} of good things{G18} to come{G3195}, and not{G3756} the{G3588} very{G846} image{G1504} of the things{G3588}, can{G1410} never{G3763} with{G2378} those{G846} sacrifices{G2378} which{G3739} they offered{G4374} year by{G2596} year{G1763} continually{G1336} make{G5048} the comers{G4334} thereunto perfect{G5048}.

For then{G1893} would they{G3973} not{G3756} have ceased{G3973} to be offered{G4374}? because{G1223} that the worshippers{G3000} once{G530} purged{G2508} should have had{G2192} no{G3367} more{G2089} conscience{G4893} of sins{G266}.
But{G235} in{G1722} those{G846} sacrifices there is a remembrance again{G364} made of sins{G266} every{G2596} year{G1763}.
For{G1063} it is not possible{G102} that{G851} the blood{G129} of bulls{G5022} and{G2532} of goats{G5131} should take away{G851} sins{G266}.

Wherefore{G1352} when he cometh{G1525} into{G1519} the world{G3588}, he saith{G3004}, Sacrifice{G2378} and{G2532} offering{G4376} thou wouldest{G2309} not{G3756}, but{G1161} a body{G4983} hast thou prepared{G2675} me{G3427}:
In burnt offerings{G3646} and{G2532} sacrifices for{G4012} sin{G266} thou hast had{G2106} no{G3756} pleasure{G2106}.
Then{G5119} said I{G2036}, Lo{G2400}, I come{G2240} (in{G1722} the volume{G2777} of the book{G975} it is written{G1125} of{G4012} me{G1700},) to do{G4160} thy{G4675} will{G3588}, O God{G3588}.

Above{G511} when{G3754} he said{G3004}, Sacrifice{G2378} and{G2532} offering{G4376} and{G2532} burnt offerings{G3646} and{G2532} offering for{G4012} sin{G266} thou wouldest{G2309} not{G3756}, neither{G3761} hadst pleasure{G2106} therein; which{G3748} are offered{G4374} by{G2596} the law{G3588};
Then{G5119} said he{G2046}, Lo{G2400}, I come{G2240} to do{G4160} thy{G4675} will{G3588}, O God{G3588}. He taketh away{G337} the first{G4413}, that{G2443} he may establish{G2476} the second{G1208}.
By{G1722} the{G2307} which{G3739} will{G2307} we are{G2070} sanctified{G37} through{G1223} the offering{G3588} of the body{G3588} of Jesus{G3588} Christ{G5547} once{G2178} for all.

And{G2532} every{G3956} priest{G2409}standeth{G2476} daily{G2250} ministering{G3008} and{G2532} offering{G4374} oftentimes{G4178} the{G2378} same{G846} sacrifices{G2378}, which{G3748} can{G1410} never{G3763} take away{G4014} sins{G266}:
But{G1161} this man{G846}, after he had offered{G4374} one{G1520} sacrifice{G2378} for{G5228} sins{G266} for{G1519} ever{G1336}, sat down{G2523} on{G1722} the right hand{G1188} of God{G3588};
From henceforth{G3063} expecting{G1551} till{G2193} his{G846} enemies{G2190} be made{G5087} his{G846} footstool{G5286}.
For{G1063} by one{G1520} offering{G4376} he hath perfected{G5048} for{G1519} ever{G1336} them that are sanctified{G37}.
Whereof the{G3588} Holy{G40} Ghost{G4151} also{G2532} is a witness{G3140} to us{G2254}: for{G1063} after{G3326} that he had said before{G4280},

This{G3778} is the covenant{G3588} that{G3739} I will make{G1303} with{G4314} them{G846} after{G3326} those{G1565} days{G3588}, saith{G3004} the Lord{G2962}, I will put{G1325} my{G3450} laws{G3551} into{G1909} their{G846} hearts{G2588}, and{G2532} in{G1909} their{G846} minds{G3588} will I write{G1924} them{G846};
And{G2532} their{G846} sins{G3588} and{G2532} iniquities{G3588} will I remember{G3415} no{G3756} more{G2089}.
Now{G1161} where{G3699} remission{G859} of these{G5130} is, there is no more{G3765} offering{G4376} for{G4012} sin{G266}.
Having{G2192} therefore{G3767}, brethren{G80}, boldness{G3954} to{G1519} enter into{G3588} the holiest{G39} by{G1722} the blood{G3588} of Jesus{G2424},

By a{G3598} new{G4372} and{G2532} living{G2198} way{G3598}, which{G3739} he hath consecrated{G1457} for us{G2254}, through{G1223} the veil{G3588}, that{G5124} is to say{G2076}, his{G846} flesh{G3588};
And{G2532} having an{G2409} high{G3173} priest{G2409} over{G1909} the house{G3588} of God{G3588};

Let us draw near{G4334} with{G3326} a{G2588} true{G228} heart{G2588} in{G1722} full assurance{G4136} of faith{G4102}, having{G4472} our hearts{G3588} sprinkled{G4472} from{G575} an{G4893} evil{G4190} conscience{G4893}, and{G2532} our bodies{G3588} washed{G3068} with{G5204} pure{G2513} water{G5204}.
Let us hold fast{G2722} the profession{G3588} of{G3588} our faith{G1680} without wavering{G186}; (for{G1063} he{G1861} is faithful{G4103} that promised{G1861};)
And{G2532} let us consider{G2657} one another{G240} to{G1519} provoke{G3948} unto love{G26} and{G2532} to{G2041} good{G2570} works{G2041}:

Not{G3361} forsaking{G1459} the assembling{G3588} of ourselves{G1438} together{G1997}, as{G2531} the manner{G1485} of some{G5100} is; but{G235} exhorting{G3870} one another: and{G2532} so much{G5118} the more{G3123}, as{G3745} ye see{G991} the day{G3588} approaching{G1448}.

For{G1063} if{G264} we{G2257}sin{G264} wilfully{G1596} after{G3326} that we have received{G2983} the knowledge{G3588} of the truth{G3588}, there remaineth{G620} no more{G3765} sacrifice{G2378} for{G4012} sins{G266},
But{G1161} a certain{G5100} fearful{G5398} looking for{G1561} of judgment{G2920} and{G2532} fiery{G4442} indignation{G2205}, which{G2068} shall{G3195} devour{G2068} the adversaries{G5227}.
He that{G5100} despised{G114} Moses'{G3475} law{G3551} died{G599} without{G5565} mercy{G3628} under{G1909} two{G1417} or{G2228} three{G5140} witnesses{G3144}:

Of how much{G4214} sorer{G5501} punishment{G5098}, suppose ye{G1380}, shall he be thought worthy{G515}, who hath trodden under foot{G2662} the Son{G3588} of God{G3588}, and{G2532} hath counted{G2233} the blood{G3588} of the covenant{G3588}, where{G3739}with{G1722} he was sanctified{G37}, an unholy thing{G2839}, and{G2532} hath done despite unto{G1796} the Spirit{G3588} of grace{G3588}?

For{G1063} we know{G1492} him that hath said{G2036}, Vengeance{G1557} belongeth unto me{G1698}, I{G1473} will recompense{G467}, saith{G3004} the Lord{G2962}. And{G2532} again{G3825}, The Lord{G2962} shall judge{G2919} his{G846} people{G3588}.
It is a fearful thing{G5398} to fall{G1706} into{G1519} the hands{G5495} of the{G2316} living{G2198} God{G2316}.

But{G1161} call to remembrance{G363} the{G2250} former{G4386} days{G2250}, in{G1722} which{G3739}, after ye were illuminated{G5461}, ye endured{G5278} a{G119} great{G4183} fight{G119} of afflictions{G3804};

Partly{G5124}, whilst ye were made a gazingstock{G2301} both{G5037} by reproaches{G3680} and{G2532} afflictions{G2347}; and{G1161} partly{G5124}, whilst ye became{G1096} companions{G2844} of them that were{G390} so{G3779} used{G390}.

For{G1063} ye had compassion{G4834} of me{G3450} in my bonds{G3588}, and{G2532} took{G4327} joyfully{G5479} the spoiling{G3588} of{G5224} your{G5216} goods{G5224}, knowing{G1097} in{G1722} yourselves{G1438} that ye have{G2192} in{G1722} heaven{G3772} a{G5223} better{G2909} and{G2532} an enduring{G3306} substance{G5223}.
Cast{G577} not{G3361} away{G577} therefore{G3767} your{G5216} confidence{G3588}, which{G3748} hath{G2192} great{G3173} recompence of reward{G3405}.
For{G1063} ye have{G2192} need{G5532} of patience{G5281}, that{G2443}, after ye have done{G4160} the will{G3588} of God{G3588}, ye might receive{G2865} the promise{G3588}.
For{G1063} yet{G2089} a little{G3397} while{G3745}, and he that shall come{G2064} will come{G2240}, and{G2532} will{G5549} not{G3756} tarry{G5549}.

Now{G1161} the just{G1342} shall live{G2198} by{G1537} faith{G4102}: but{G2532} if{G1437} any man draw back{G5288}, my{G3450} soul{G3588} shall have{G2106} no{G3756} pleasure{G2106} in{G1722} him{G846}.
But{G1161} we{G2249} are{G2070} not{G3756} of them who draw back{G5289} unto{G1519} perdition{G684}; but{G235} of them that believe{G4102} to{G1519} the saving{G4047} of the soul{G5590}.
